input.description: adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter that is enabled on the Peer. The default adapter name is HPSEActor

1. Lists the switches the management server detects.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>switch</category> <process-id>find-switch-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] Indicates that details of all switches detected by management server should be listed.
2. Provides the name of the switch specified by the switch identifier.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>switch</category> <process-id>find-switch-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <switch-id>1001</switch-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. switch-id[Required] id of the switch whose details are required.
3. Lists the elements associated with the specified switch, such as ports, zones, zone aliases and zone sets.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>switch</category> <process-id>find-switch-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <switch-id>1001</switch-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. switch-id[Required] id of the switch whose details are required. all[Required] Indicates that details of all elements of the specified switch are required.
4. Provides information about the ports on the specified switch.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>switch</category> <process-id>find-switch-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <port/> <switch-id>1001</switch-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. switch-id[Required] id of the switch whose details are required. port[Required] Indicates that details of ports on the specified switch are required.
5. Provides information about zone aliases on the specified switch.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>switch</category> <process-id>find-switch-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <zonealias/> <switch-id>1001</switch-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. switch-id[Required] id of the switch whose details are required. zonealias[Required] Indicates that details of zonealias on the specified switch are required.
6. Provides information about zones on the specified switch.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>switch</category> <process-id>find-switch-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <zone/> <switch-id>1001</switch-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. switch-id[Required] id of the switch whose details are required. zone[Required] Indicates that details of zones on the specified switch are required.
7. Provides information about zone sets on the specified switch.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>switch</category> <process-id>find-switch-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <zoneset/> <switch-id>1001</switch-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. switch-id[Required] id of the switch whose details are required. zoneset[Required] Indicates that details of zonesets on the specified switch are required.
8. Provides detailed information about the switches detected by the management server.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>switch</category> <process-id>find-switch-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] Indicates that details of all switches detected by managament server are required.
9. Provides detailed information about the specified switch.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>switch</category> <process-id>find-switch-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <switch-id>1001</switch-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. switch-id[Required] id of the switch whose details are required.
10. Provides detailed information about the specified switch and the subelements of the switch, such as ports, zones, zone aliases, and zone sets.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>switch</category> <process-id>find-switch-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <switch-id>1001</switch-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. switch-id[Required] id of the switch whose details are required. all[Required] Indicates that details of all elements of the specified switch are required.
11. Provides detailed information about zones in the switch fabric.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>switch</category> <process-id>find-switch-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <zone/> <switch-id>1001</switch-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. switch-id[Required] id of the switch whose details are required. zone[Required] Indicates that details of zones on the specified switch are required.
12. Provides detailed information about zone aliases in the switch fabric.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>switch</category> <process-id>find-switch-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <zonealias/> <switch-id>1001</switch-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. switch-id[Required] id of the switch whose details are required. zonealias[Required] Indicates that details of zonealiases on the specified switch are required.
13. Provides detailed information about zone sets in the switch fabric.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>switch</category> <process-id>find-switch-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <zoneset/> <switch-id>1001</switch-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. switch-id[Required] id of the switch whose details are required. zoneset[Required] Indicates that details of zonesets on the specified switch are required.

documentation.description:
This wrapper supports the following requirements:-
1. Lists the switches the management server detects. 2. Provides the name of the switch specified by the switch identifier. 3. Lists the elements associated with the specified switch, such as ports, zones, zone aliases and zone sets. 4. Provides information about the ports on the specified switch. 5. Provides information about zone aliases on the specified switch. 6. Provides information about zones on the specified switch. 7. Provides information about zone sets on the specified switch. 8. Provides detailed information about the switches detected by the management server. 9. Provides detailed information about the specified switch. 10. Provides detailed information about the specified switch and the subelements of the switch, such as ports, zones, zone aliases, and zone sets. 11. Provides detailed information about zones in the switch fabric. 12. Provides detailed information about zone sets in the switch fabric. 13. Provides detailed information about zone aliases in the switch fabric.
